title: First Look: The Litespeed Coll Dels Reis is the World’s Lightest Titanium Road Bike
content:
Litespeed is well-versed in the manufacture lightweight titanium road frames but the all-new Coll Dels Reis breaks new ground going sub 1,000 grams for the first time in history

Read the full article at First Look: The Litespeed Coll Dels Reis is the World’s Lightest Titanium Road Bike on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
